summary: Ideally locted under the bridge near to the blacksmith shop,fully fitted in excellent decorative order.lots of storage space and an arcane enchanter.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod. the Idea come from BarronTV1...at first I wanna a enchanter,so I change his mod
for an enchanter .And then I change almost everything for the love of talos. .. Just have fun !


In order to have the best experience in game ,highly commend also install this mod below.

Unlimited Bookshelves by da5id2701

Can be find here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10891/?

The ENB which I used in the screenshots is projectENB 0.119 SERIES

You can find it here http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20781//? in the old versions

I choose the extreme option files and modified by turn on all effects except skylighting and original

options,and it's really high performance and beautiful.



If someone can adds more functions into this mod such as a useable lute like the guitar in metro 2033 or 2034,Or make wine barrel can be used by player,or something you feel interesting ,you are welcome ,You can use this mod as freely as you wish.


The difference between useable version and simple version is the sill out the window,by the way useable sill can be used by player like a book shelf ,simple is simple.
author: cucucar

files.name: Useable
files.changelogHtml: Change part of navmesh under the bridge ,follower will not try to through the wall or the windows come in the little place anymore ,and follower will be more smart in the little place .but follower still can't use a cup while drinking wine from the barrel ,and the barrel still can't be used by player. Even more I wanna the Dibella statue can be used like a music box with rotary animation, when you sleeping on the bed to replace the boring sleeping menu.

files.name: Simple
files.changelogHtml: Change part of navmesh under the bridge ,follower will not try to through the wall or the windows come in the little place anymore ,and follower will be more smart in the little place .but follower still can't use a cup while drinking wine from the barrel ,and the barrel still can't be used by player. Even more I wanna the Dibella statue can be used like a music box with rotary animation, when you sleeping on the bed to replace the boring sleeping menu.
